name: Photo Shooting
description: A full day photo shooting at Saha studio. Four to Eight hours. Location can be outside too based on the requirements

name: Video Shooting
description: There is the latest video capturing cameras in Saha studio. You can get 4k to 8k videos. I bought the red camera few days ago.

name: Photo Editing
description: If you have already photos taken or want the photos that I takes to be edited as well, you can purchase this service.

name: Pre Wedding
description: It's a thing nowadays. I have contract with some of the best outdoor location in the locality. A full day outdoor shoot for Eight to Ten hours.

name: Event Organize
description: I can decorate your event like it's a dream. Whether is is a small wedding program, birthday party or office gathering.

name: Photo Printing
description: At Saha studio you can get the best quality papers for your exclusive moment with special frames.
